choices.text:
### Human:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
### Assistant:

Dear [Boss], 

I wanted to let you know that I will be leaving the company. It has been a pleasure working with you and everyone else here, but it is time for me to move on to new opportunities. 

Thank you for everything you have taught me during my time here, and I wish you all the best in the future. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
